*** Bug 203064 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Mik: InteractionContextExternalizer has two class variables, reader and writer, that may be closing the output stream if used by two threads simultaneously. The accessors to these are just for unit testing so I think we could construct both within the scope of the method and come up with a work around for the unit tests.
*** Bug 203433 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Rob: I didn't get to this in your absence, over to you.
This should be fixed but testing is not straight forward. Please reopen if you see this again post 2.1.

Rob: I'm still seeing these on the latest.  My activity appears to be intact (i.e. previously activated tasks show).
